p: At present, most studies researching Psa are concentrated on small-scale ranges, while there are relatively few studies that examine the potential geographic distribution of Psa on large scales and model future niches under climate change scenarios. Based on the maximum entropy principle, the MaxEnt software uses the species distribution data and the environmental variables to analyze the distribution state of the species when the entropy is the largest [ 76]. Numerous studies show that MaxEnt performs better than other niche models and has advantages, such as short running time, easy operation, small sample size and high simulation precision [ 68, 77â€“ 79]; therefore, this study was designed to examine the large scale and future distribution of Psa using MaxEnt theory.
